track.name: Drug Ballad
comments: "But when it's all said and done I'll be 40 before I know it with a 40 on the porch telling stories with a bottle of Jack, two grandkids in my lap, babysitting for Hailie while Hailie's out getting smashed"  Time does fly. Can remember when I first heard the song in 2000. He's 40 today, not retired and Hailie has turned out fine.
IN THIRD GRADE ALL I USED TO DO IS SNIFF GLUE THROUGH A TUBE AND PLAY RUBRIK'S CUBE

This one really grew on me.
I remember that I used to hate this song, or at least really dislike it, but the way he raps in this one really.. well, yeah, grew on me.
Damn, this is a funky track!!
They wont ever let em go
i like to shove potatoes in my ass
Possibly the best one of MMLP.
Basically the "Cum on Everybody" of the MMLP.
